Title: Relates to enacting the making equitable and alternative lunches (MEAL) act
Summary: Enacts the "making equitable and alternative lunches (MEAL) act"; requires a public school to offer a plant-based food option, a halal food option and a kosher food option as an alternative to every meal or snack offered in food service to any student who chooses such alternative meal or snack as an option.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to enacting the "making equitable and alternative lunches (MEAL) act"
